description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The application seeks to discharge details relating to  Condition 30 (Details of the flood void) of planning permission 23/01707/FUL (Demolitionof existing building and outbuilding, and erection of a new four storey building housing a mix of 7 dwellingswith associated refuse and cycle provision.)Relevant history23/01707/FUL Planning permission was granted 25 October 2023 for Demolition of existing building andoutbuilding, and erection of a new four storey building housing a mix of 7 dwellings with associated refuse and cycle provision.23/03457/CLC Details required for Condition 19 (finished floor levels), 20 (full details of the extra flood resistance and resilience measures), 22 (updated management plan for SuDS pump) & 30 (Details of the flood void) of Planning Permission ref: 23/01707/FUL was Refused 28 Feb 2024. The reason for refusal states: Given that no details for flood resistance measures have been submitted, the proposal is considered to be contrary to policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014,the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDFCore Strategy 2012.24/00815/CLC Details required for Condition 19 (Finished Floor Levels), Condition 20 (Details of the Extra Flood Resistance and Resilience Measures), Condition 22 (Management Plan for SUDS Pump) and Condition 30 (Details of the flood void) of planning permission 23/01707/FUL (Demolition of existing building and outbuilding, and erection of a new four storey building housing a mix of 7 dwellingswith associated refuse and cycle provision.). The schme was refused due to lack of details relatinbg to drainage layout and  SUDs.This submission relates to details relating to flood voids, condition 30 only. Condition 30 reads:Details of the flood void below the proposed development, ground floor height and means of maintenance of the flood void shall be submitted to the local planning authority for approval. The development shall be implemented and maintained in perpetuity in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To prevent the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards forSustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.Details of the floor voids are shown on the plan SCHR-AP2-19. A detailed section is also provided. The drawing notes that access panels will allow for maintenance, cleaning and jetting tasks.The application demonstrates reasonable compliance with the requirements of condition 30.
